title: Pop star Monetochka reminds Russians of their country’s lost liberal moment
content: Monetochka’s viral hit “It Was in Russia” has struck a chord among Russians who are posting it on social media with images of different times in Russia.
summary: Monetochka’s viral hit “It Was in Russia” has struck a chord among Russians who are posting it on social media with images of different times in Russia.

title: Israeli American hostage Hersh Goldberg-Polin killed, family and White House confirm
content: Goldberg-Polin, 23, had been kidnapped by Hamas on Oct. 7. His family’s statement came after the Israeli military announced it had located dead bodies in Gaza.
summary: Goldberg-Polin, 23, had been kidnapped by Hamas on Oct. 7. His family’s statement came after the Israeli military announced it had located dead bodies in Gaza.

title: The quiet technocrat who steered Biden’s effort to tighten the border
content: Blas Nuñez-Neto is the architect of a Biden’s immigration strategy - strict at the border, generous lawful pathways - that is working after 3.5 years.
summary: Blas Nuñez-Neto is the architect of a Biden’s immigration strategy - strict at the border, generous lawful pathways - that is working after 3.5 years.

title: López Obrador’s final act: A radical challenge to Mexico’s democracy
content: Diplomats say López Obrador’s judicial reforms threaten Mexico’s young democracy and the United States’ most important trade relationship.
summary: Diplomats say López Obrador’s judicial reforms threaten Mexico’s young democracy and the United States’ most important trade relationship.

title: 7 U.S. troops hurt in dramatic raid that killed numerous ISIS fighters
content: A military raid in western Iraq killed 15 Islamic State fighters and left seven Americans wounded, U.S. officials said. All are said to be in stable condition.
summary: A military raid in western Iraq killed 15 Islamic State fighters and left seven Americans wounded, U.S. officials said. All are said to be in stable condition.

title: Mass polio vaccination to begin in Gaza after the deadly disease reemerges
content: Polio’s reemergence poses a threat to the war-torn territory and adjacent regions. A baby, Gaza’s first polio case in 25 years, can no longer move his limbs.
summary: Polio’s reemergence poses a threat to the war-torn territory and adjacent regions. A baby, Gaza’s first polio case in 25 years, can no longer move his limbs.

title: Musk and Durov are facing the revenge of the regulators
content: For years, internet moguls like Elon Musk and Pavel Durov have flown above the law as captains of free speech. Now they’re hitting turbulence.
summary: For years, internet moguls like Elon Musk and Pavel Durov have flown above the law as captains of free speech. Now they’re hitting turbulence.

title: Six people killed in Russian glide bomb attack in Kharkiv
content: Russian forces used aerial guided, Soviet-era bombs weighing more than 1,000 pounds in the bombardment, according to Ukraine’s general prosecutor’s office.
summary: Russian forces used aerial guided, Soviet-era bombs weighing more than 1,000 pounds in the bombardment, according to Ukraine’s general prosecutor’s office.

title: Brazilian judge orders suspension of X in dispute with Elon Musk
content: X owner Elon Musk has refused to reestablish an office in the country to respond to government requests to take down accounts that spread fake news.
summary: X owner Elon Musk has refused to reestablish an office in the country to respond to government requests to take down accounts that spread fake news.

title: Chasing the perfect abs, men flock to plastic surgery
content: Men are turning to ultra-high-definition liposuction, a plastic surgery procedure pioneered in Brazil, to sculpt six-packs and perfect abs.
summary: Men are turning to ultra-high-definition liposuction, a plastic surgery procedure pioneered in Brazil, to sculpt six-packs and perfect abs.

title: Authorities race to remove tons of rotting fish from Greek port
content: The Volos chamber of commerce said the dead fish created an overwhelming stench. More than 160 tons of fish have been removed, local media reported.
summary: The Volos chamber of commerce said the dead fish created an overwhelming stench. More than 160 tons of fish have been removed, local media reported.

title: Thousands cheer on defiant palm tree as Typhoon Shanshan hits Japan
content: As the deadly storm made landfall, people were glued to a live stream, rooting for a solitary palm tree — known affectionately as “Yasshi” — to endure.
summary: As the deadly storm made landfall, people were glued to a live stream, rooting for a solitary palm tree — known affectionately as “Yasshi” — to endure.

title: Ukraine’s gamble in Russia has yet to slow Moscow’s eastern assault
content: Ukraine’s advances into Russia buoyed morale but Moscow’s forces are poised to bite off new chunks of the country in the east.
summary: Ukraine’s advances into Russia buoyed morale but Moscow’s forces are poised to bite off new chunks of the country in the east.

title: Israel strikes aid convoy organized by U.S. nonprofit, killing 4 Palestinians
content: The Anera convoy was carrying medical supplies and fuel to a hospital in Rafah, and its route was coordinated in advance with the IDF.
summary: The Anera convoy was carrying medical supplies and fuel to a hospital in Rafah, and its route was coordinated in advance with the IDF.

title: In a grim Russian cell, a hippie LGBTQ artist survived with her inner joy
content: Alexandra Skochilenko became known for flashing a smile and heart symbols in court even as she was sentenced to seven years in prison for a minor antiwar protest.
summary: Alexandra Skochilenko became known for flashing a smile and heart symbols in court even as she was sentenced to seven years in prison for a minor antiwar protest.

title: Ukraine Air Force commander dismissed after F-16 crash
content: Mykola Oleshchuk, the head of Ukraine’s Air Force, was replaced a day after the military said one of its Western-supplied F-16 fighter jets crashed this week.
summary: Mykola Oleshchuk, the head of Ukraine’s Air Force, was replaced a day after the military said one of its Western-supplied F-16 fighter jets crashed this week.

title: Israeli evacuation orders force displaced Gazans into ever-smaller spaces
content: Israeli evacuation orders in August have shrunk Gaza’s only humanitarian zone by nearly a third and deepened the plight of displaced Palestinians.
summary: Israeli evacuation orders in August have shrunk Gaza’s only humanitarian zone by nearly a third and deepened the plight of displaced Palestinians.

title: As Germany’s far right reaches milestone moment, extremists grow bolder
content: The AfD could emerge for the first time as the strongest party in a German state parliament after Sunday elections in Saxony and Thuringia.
summary: The AfD could emerge for the first time as the strongest party in a German state parliament after Sunday elections in Saxony and Thuringia.
